name: Husqvarna Viking Embroidery File
summary: Learn about .SHV files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Sewists who use a Husqvarna Viking Designer I sewing machine can use the company's complementary embroidery design software to create and export designs as SHV files. They can then transfer the SHV files to their sewing machine using a floppy disk.
NOTE: Husqvarna Viking sewing machines are owned by SGSB Co. Ltd.

instructions: You can open and edit SHV files with Husqvarna Viking PREMIER+ 2 (Windows, Mac), which is Husqvarna Viking's complimentary embroidery design software.
To transfer an SHV file to your Designer I sewing machine, save the file to a floppy disk and then insert the disk into your sewing machine. Then, load the SHV file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
